issue.title: [R] Skip duckdb test that is failing until the issue is resolved
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17818](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17818). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The followup to actually fix this is ARROW-17809 (the first try was ARROW-17643). It is likely a DuckDB problem; however, it's difficult to diagnose and will take some time. In the meantime, we should just skip the test because it is obscuring other failures.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17818?focusedCommentId=17608452) by Dewey Dunnington (paleolimbot):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14209
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14209>
